comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/happyjin>@happyjin</denchmark-link> - Thats a warning message.. with reference to the 2nd screenshot I believe the pertubed data prep folder must be prepared having around 496332 utterances. with reference to the 1st screenshot, Attaching any log file present in the decode_train_dev_decode_lm/log would help to fix the error.

Hi, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/speechLearner>@speechLearner</denchmark-link> Thanks for your awesome advice. I follow <denchmark-link:https://github.com/espnet/espnet/issues/2433>#2433</denchmark-link> and solved this. I close this issue.
